original_title: From Romero to Rome: The Rise and Fall of the Italian Zombie Movie
overview: The history of Italian zombie cinema, beginning with the breakout worldwide influence and success of George Romero's Night of the Living Dead and continuing through to Lucio Fulci's trend-setting Zombie Flesh-Eaters (Zombi 2) and its many imitators.
title: From Romero to Rome: The Rise and Fall of the Italian Zombie Movie
